definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: brightness, splendour (Targum id., Syr. ziywo0, perhaps loan-word from As. zîmu, chiefly of countenance, Dl:WB 252: Pr 152 Nö:ZMG xl (1886), 732 Jen:ZK ii. 43 Brock:Lex. Syr. 93);—sf. [[זִיוִי]] Da 4:33 splendour of royalty; [[זִוֵהּ]] Da 2:31 (of image); pl. brightness of countenance: sf. [[זִיוַי]] Kt, [[זיויך]] Kt, [[זִיוׇךְ]] Qr, Da 5:10, [[זִי֫וֹהִי]] Da 5:6, Da 5:9.
